blogPost.excerpt: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
blogPost.body: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
blogPost.title: SnapSmile - We use machine learning to help improve your dental health
blogPost.author: Kartik Bala

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款应用程序，它使用你的饮食习惯+你的牙齿图像，为你提供改善家里口腔健康所需的洞察力和建议。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教练。
localize.tagline: 我们使用机器学习来帮助改善您的牙齿健康

localize.description: SnapSmilar是一款應用程序，它使用你的飲食習慣+你的牙齒圖像，爲你提供改善家裏口腔健康所需的洞察力和建議。把SnapSmilar想象成你自己的牙科教練。
localize.tagline: 我們使用機器學習來幫助改善您的牙齒健康

previous.excerpt: Clean and clear UI Kit with necessary stuff to create design projects. It’s the simplest way to work with buttons, charts, inputs, and popups with saving huge amount of time. Let your workflow become pleasant and trust such things to Deca UI Kit.
previous.title: Free Deca UI Kit - Clean UI Kit with necessary stuff to create design projects

localize.description: 干净、清晰的UI工具包，包含创建设计项目所需的内容。这是使用按钮、图表、输入和弹出窗口的最简单方式，可以节省大量时间。让您的工作流程变得令人愉快，并将这些东西托付给Deca UI Kit。
localize.tagline: 干净的UI工具包，包含创建设计项目所需的内容

localize.description: 乾淨、清晰的UI工具包，包含創建設計項目所需的內容。這是使用按鈕、圖表、輸入和彈出窗口的最簡單方式，可以節省大量時間。讓您的工作流程變得令人愉快，並將這些東西託付給Deca UI Kit。
localize.tagline: 乾淨的UI工具包，包含創建設計項目所需的內容

next.excerpt: This is my first 3D illustration pack, I've prepared 15 3D hand gestures in cartoon style that can be used for user interfaces, social media posts, presentations, infographics and banners.
next.title: 3D Hand Gestures - Cute hand gestures for your designs.

localize.description: 这是我的第一个3D插图包，我已经准备了15个卡通风格的3D手势，可以用于用户界面、社交媒体帖子、演示文稿、信息图表和横幅。
這是我的第一個3D插圖包，我已經準備了15個卡通風格的3D手勢，可以用於用戶界面、社交媒體帖子、演示文稿、信息圖表和橫幅。
